Lush Naked Cleansing Balm, Tea Totaler (2019 formulation)

Category: Facial Cleanser
book: 1446-Lush Naked Cleansing Balm, Tea Totaler (2019 formulation)

chunk: Ingredients: Illipe Butter (Shorea Stenoptera), Castor Oil (Ricinus Communis), Safflower Oil (Carthamus tinctorius), Witch Hazel Extract (Hamamelis Virginiana), Water (Aqua), Sunflower Wax (Helianthus Annuus), Japan Wax (Rhus Succedanea), Lemongrass oil (Cymbopogon Flexuosus), Rosemary Oil (Rosmarinus Officinalis), Sage Oil (Salvia officinalis),
book: 1446-Lush Naked Cleansing Balm, Tea Totaler (2019 formulation)

chunk: Virginiana), Water (Aqua), Sunflower Wax (Helianthus Annuus), Japan Wax (Rhus Succedanea), Lemongrass oil (Cymbopogon Flexuosus), Rosemary Oil (Rosmarinus Officinalis), Sage Oil (Salvia officinalis), Tea Tree Oil (Melaleuca alternifolia), Thyme Oil (Thymus Zygis), Benzoin Resinoid (Styrax Tonkinensis Pierre), Hand Harvested Sea Salt, *Citral,
book: 1446-Lush Naked Cleansing Balm, Tea Totaler (2019 formulation)

chunk: Officinalis), Sage Oil (Salvia officinalis), Tea Tree Oil (Melaleuca alternifolia), Thyme Oil (Thymus Zygis), Benzoin Resinoid (Styrax Tonkinensis Pierre), Hand Harvested Sea Salt, *Citral, *Limonene
book: 1446-Lush Naked Cleansing Balm, Tea Totaler (2019 formulation)

chunk:
Directions: Melt between the fingers before massaging over the skin or simply glide the bar over the face, then wipe away with a damp face cloth.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity; LOW: Cancer, Use Restrictions
book: 1446-Lush Naked Cleansing Balm, Tea Totaler (2019 formulation)
